Uses of Player in clueServer
 

Fields in clueServer declared as Player
private  Player[] Users.playerArr
          representation of structure of all players.
 

Methods in clueServer that return Player
 Player Users.getPlayer(int p_num)
          Purpose: Get the index of a player in the user array

Preconditions: There are objects in the player array
Postconditions: There is a number known for a particular player
Pseudo-Code:
BEGIN
FOR each element in the array of players:
--> IF the element is not null and it has a playername that matches the search parameter:
--> --> return the element
--> ELSE :
--> --> return NULL
END
(Added 12 DEC 2008, Michael Philippone)
 Player Users.getPlayer(String name, boolean searchByPiece)
          Purpose: Get an instance of a Player in the user array based on the playerName or pieceName field

Preconditions: There are objects in the player array
Postconditions: There is a number known for a particular player
Pseudo-Code:
BEGIN
- IF searching by piece name:
- - FOR each element in the array of players:
- - - IF the element is not null and it has a pieceName that matches the search parameter:
- - - - return the player at that element
- ELSE:
- - FOR each element in the array of players:
- - - IF the element is not null and it has a playerName that matches the search parameter:
- - - - return the player at that element
- return NULL (if we get this point, none of the Players in the array match)
END
(Added 12 DEC 2008, Michael Philippone)

 Player PlayerTesting.makePlayer()
          Purpose: Facilitate the creation of a Player object

Preconditions: A PlayerTesting has been established
Postconditions: A Player object has been tested
Pseudo-Code:
Create an instance of the Player object
END
 Player MessagePassingServer.makePlayer()
